author: Tarvin Gill
title: Here's how coronavirus infection could have been reduced through e-wallets - Mashable SE Asia
description: Here's how coronavirus infection could have been reduced through e-wallets Mashable SE Asia
content:
Technology has done the world a great deed. We take it for granted, but it never complains, it's only there to serve.
But perhaps in a time of virus outbreaks and lockdowns, taking it for granted might have not been the best of moves.
Virus or no virus, the… [+4226 chars]
